Container.Name: lidarr-extended
Container.Overview:
Lidarr is a music collection manager for Usenet and BitTorrent users. It can monitor multiple RSS feeds for new tracks from your favorite artists and will grab, sort and rename them. It can also be configured to automatically upgrade the quality of files already downloaded when a better quality format becomes available..
[br][br][b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br]
[b]/config[/b] : Storing all Lidarr config files [br]
[b]/music[/b] : Point to Music share[br]
[b]/music-videos[/b] : Point to Music Videos share[br]
[b]/downloads[/b] : Point to Downloads share[br]
[b]8686[/b] : The web-interface. [br]

Config.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Config.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Config.Name: DL Client Source
Config.Description: deezer, tidal or both :: set to both, to use both clients, tidal requires extra steps, view logging output

Config.Name: Add Deezer Top Artists
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this will enable the extended script to automatically add artists that are on the Deezer Top Artist Chart to your existing Lidarr instance

Config.Name: Add Deezer Top Ablum Artists
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this will enable the extended script to automatically add artists that are on the Deezer Top Ablum Chart to your existing Lidarr instance

Config.Name: Add Deezer Top Track Artists
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Enabling this will enable the extended script to automatically add artists that are on the Deezer Top Track Chart to your existing Lidarr instance

Config.Name: Add Deezer Related Artists
Config.Description: true = enabled :: WARNING !!! WARNING !!! Enabling this can cause an endless loop of additional artists.... Enabling this will enable the extended script to automatically add artists that are related to your existing Lidarr artists from Deezer
